text: The Couch Trip is a 1988 American comedy movie directed by Michael Ritchie and starring Dan Aykroyd, Walter Matthau, Charles Grodin, Donna Dixon, Richard Romanus, Mary Gross, David Clennon, Chevy Chase. It was distributed by Orion Pictures and was a box office failure. ==Other websites== * Category:1988 comedy movies Category:American comedy movies Category:Movies directed by Michael Ritchie Category:Movies set in Los Angeles
title: The Couch Trip
